    • Constructor Detail

      • CItemView

        public CItemView()
        This small version of the UI does not need the model or service objects but, in general, references to these objects are needed in the UI. Default constructor creates a reference to Example1Service class to illustrate this.

      • CItemView

        public CItemView(java.util.Scanner input)
        This small version of the UI does not need the model or service objects but, in general, references to these objects are needed in the UI.
        Parameters:
        example1Service - reference to class which provides CItem Services

        public int readIntWithPrompt(java.lang.String prompt)
        Read the menu choice from user.
        Parameters:
        prompt - Text asking user to enter choice
        Returns:
        • 1 : Add one item to the collection of items
        • : Display collection of items
        • 6 : Exit the program
